Name: Manchester Special Rum Punch
Ingredients: 50 ml Jamaican-style overproof aged pot still rum
20 ml Honey syrup (3 parts honey to 1 water by weight)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Double old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of grapefruit slice wheel.
STRAIN into glass filled with crushed ice.
History: Originally made at the Manchester Hotel, Mandeville, Jamaica. The Manchester Hotel lies in a lush tropical setting in the centre of Jamaica high in the cool mountains of Manchester.
Nutrition: One serving of Manchester Special Rum Punch contains 212 calories
